name: Lost Ed
description:
You are Ed! A small astronaut who went to explore an unknown planet. You include several challenges, including:

Enemies like:

- Shooters
- Brutes
- Operators

Utilities to help you on your adventure:

- Speed ​​Potion
- Grenade
- Knife
- A small firearm

I hope you enjoy the game, it was produced by me as the developer’s first experience. Sorry there was something you didn't like,
I will working on it to improve your gameplay. Constructive criticism is always welcome.
